name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There Is No I In Internet

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: and this is a BIG problem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transparently rewrites webpages to have just the important text. Customize your own list of whitelisted words and block the rest!
